Name: shared
Description: shared is the clause that contains the variables shared across the threads belonging to the OpenMP parallel region concerned. Such variables are therefore accessed concurrently, arising potential data-races. It is the responsibility of the user to protect shared variables with synchronisation mechanisms, if needed. The other possible data-sharing policies are private, firstprivate, lastprivate and linear.

Parameters.Name: list
Parameters.Description: The variables to pass as shared, separated by commas.
